title: Olivia Dean and Friends Shine at Music Awards
summary: Olivia Dean is a singer who will perform at the Mobo Awards, a big music show. She is excited to sing on stage with other artists like Flo and Tiwa Savage. The awards celebrate black music and are 30 years old this year. Olivia's album is up for four awards, including album of the year. She will compete with Flo and Little Simz for this prize. The show is in Manchester on March 26 and will be hosted by Eve and Eddie Kadi. Everyone is looking forward to a fun night with great music and surprises.

a singer who will perform and has an album up for awards
a top prize at the awards for the best album
people who lead the show, like Eve and Eddie Kadi

questions.question: Who is performing at the Mobo Awards?
What is the Mobo Awards celebrating this year?
Where will the Mobo Awards be held?
What prize is Olivia Dean's album up for?
Who are the hosts of the show?
What kind of music do the Mobo Awards celebrate?

background_read: The Mobo Awards is an annual event that honors black music artists in the UK and around the world. It started 30 years ago to give recognition to talented musicians. Performers like Olivia Dean and Flo are popular singers who make soulful and R&B music. Awards like album of the year are important because they show which albums people love the most. Hosts help make the show fun by introducing acts and talking to the audience. This year, the event is in Manchester, a big city in England, and everyone is excited for a night of music and celebration.
Article_Structure: WHO: Olivia Dean, Flo, Tiwa Savage, Eve, Eddie Kadi, and other artists
WHAT: They will perform and compete at the Mobo Awards, which celebrates black music
WHERE: In Manchester at the Co-op Live venue
WHY: To mark the 30th anniversary and honor talented musicians with awards

perspectives.description: Artists like Olivia Dean are happy to perform and win awards at the show
